subject: RE: Launch webinar material
preview: hi, @heath. please check the updates. thanksphonaklaunch.com.au/may-2022-event-questionnaire15min madam @rica

full_threads.body:
hi, @heath. please check the updates. thanks
phonaklaunch.com.au/may-2022-event-questionnaire

15min madam @rica

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Can you please amend the following items;


Change ‘testing’ to tested



Change to: Which of the following charger case is not compatible with Audeo Life?


8. What percentage of those with hearing loss, state a hearing aid like Audéo Life, would make them repurchase hearing aids sooner?*
Add commas


9. Which coupling options are not compatible with Audéo Fit?*
Update to: option is


10. Which functions can not be tracked and displayed with Audéo Fit and the myPhonak app?*
Update to: function (delete the s)

Can you please update the image of the man on the quiz page to the windsurfer man.

Windsurfer man will also need to be used on the certificate.

Thanks

Mel.


From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>
Sent: Monday, 30 May 2022 8:56 PM
To: Comerford, Brenton <Brenton.Comerford@sonova.com <mailto:Brenton.Comerford@sonova.com>>
Cc: O'Brien, Melinda <Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com <mailto:Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com>>; Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com <mailto:Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>>
Subject: Re: Launch webinar material

EXTERNAL MAIL

Hi Brenton,

Confirming the below updates have been made. I have attached a certificate. Please note, this is the previous event’s design. We are waiting on the updated certificate and will load it in when we receive it.

Thanks and speak soon,

EXTERNAL MAIL



On 30 May 2022, at 8:15 pm, Comerford, Brenton <Brenton.Comerford@sonova.com <mailto:Brenton.Comerford@sonova.com>> wrote:

Thanks for this, Heath. I’ve just picked up a few small things.

When I click on the “Create certificate” button or Certificate tab if just takes me back to the home page. Can you please provide me with an example certificate so I can ensure all of the details and imagery are correct?
The Questionnaire tab seems to take you to the Reflection & Evaluation Form, and vice versa.
Question 4 on the quiz has the wrong question text. It should read “4. What is the IP rating of Audéo Life?”. The answers are correct, however.
At the top of the quiz page, it says there are 8 questions and a pass mark of 75% is needed. For this one, it’s 18 questions and 70% pass mark.

Regards,

Brenton Comerford
BMus, MAudSt, MAudA CCP
Audiology & Training Manager, Sonova Australia

12 Inglewood Place, Norwest NSW, 2153, Australia

Hi Brent,

That’s odd. I have pasted the original message here:


—————————————

Hi Mel, Brenton and Cameron,

We have the webinar site ready for launch tomorrow night, pending your approval and certificate design.

Here is a quick loom:
https://www.loom.com/share/20a7f3c1900e46e58e10c353f902d446 <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe15.bpmsafelink.com%2Fc%2FTpjC4wjCZky0wtt6Rdymlg&data=05%7C01%7CMelinda.OBrien%40phonak.com%7C7613ae5b0f174a15f7b308da422b027c%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C0%7C637895050768077933%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=WUwgmcAycvvNZ7nuFsTel1HbznswlF76oMr9nYSfgwY%3D&reserved=0>

And here is a link to the page:
https://phonaklaunch.com.au/may-2022-event-questionnaire/ <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe15.bpmsafelink.com%2Fc%2FIfEa7EDd30K3rG2NGXKNPw&data=05%7C01%7CMelinda.OBrien%40phonak.com%7C7613ae5b0f174a15f7b308da422b027c%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C0%7C637895050768077933%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=mhEjHzGwHSfohEnrIP4VgBBnIGtYFLUhqZtxsKNyD4c%3D&reserved=0>

Please let me know if you have any changes? And send through the certificate when ready.

Thanks and speak soon,

—————————————

Thanks,
